thought: The question asks about the actions that the tax officer must take when the transferring company fails to submit the withholding tax return. The answer clearly states that the tax officer must notify the receiving company of the failure to submit the return. This is a straightforward extraction as the answer is directly related to the question without any additional rationale needed for clarification.
answer: เจ้าพนักงานประเมินต้องแจ้งการไม่ยื่นแบบแสดงรายการนั้นต่อบริษัทผู้รับโอนก่อน
